ActEmergency Management Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 113 - which authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NOVA SCOTIA in respect of damage caused by the flooding that affected an the counties of Colchester, Pictou, Antigonish, Inverness, Victoria, Cumberland and Halifax on August 29 and August 31, 2008.
